author: veithen
msg: Filter README.txt and RELEASE-NOTE.txt in the same way as in the binary distribution (and the source distributions of earlier Axiom releases).

author: veithen
msg: Older versions of maven-assembly-plugin had problems with file permissions in ZIP files, but this is no longer the case.

author: veithen
msg: Fix the base directory configuration for the binary distribution.

author: rwhitcomb
msg: Code cleanup:  Use try-with-resources in the Image loading code to simplify.

author: rwhitcomb
msg: Minor cleanup of the Pivot859 test program:
* Change the status message from the "Clear" button.
* Measure the elapsed time more closely to the actual read
from the URL input stream, and measure using "System.nanoTime"
